    We welcome applications from potential graduate students and postdocs with strong computational skills who want to join our groupâ€™s eclectic mix of statisticians, geophysicists, climate modelers, and policy scholars. Potential graduate students can apply through a variety of Rutgers programs, including Atmospheric Science, Geological Sciences, Oceanography, Statistics, and Planning and Public Policy, and are encouraged to consider the Coastal Climate Risk & Resilience traineeship. Contact Bob Kopp for more information.
